item.title: Lecture notes: "Statistical properties of dynamics. Introduction to the functional analytic approach"
item.description: I’m uploading the lecture notes of a minicourse, in the Pisa-Hokkaido summer school 2015. It is a very elementary approach to the subject, intended for advanced undergaduate students or first years Ph.D. ones. Notes_2015_hokudai2

item.title: Lecture notes on "Complessità Caos Informazione"
item.description: I am uploading the lecture notes of a course I gave in Camerino in the academic years 2003-2004 and 2004-2005. Complessità Caos Informazione
